ygData.subject: RE: Lambent Stones on E'ci
ygData.msgSnippet: ... hand ... I was quite lucky.  I was given my Lambent stone after helping a couple of higher levels in a GM run event.  They were very beat up and needed
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Mike Roach <mike.roach@...>
>
>I have a problem with obtaining lambent stones.
>
>This may be just on E'ci, but greedy people are seriously trying to cash in
>on lambent stones. I got a few answers to my requests for stones, but the
>cheapest anyone was willing to give me one for was 20pp with some morons
>saying they sell for 100-200pp each. I agree with others on this list who
>refuse to pay for the stones for various reasons. I have spent over 1000pp
>purchasing gemstones (sapphires, rubies, etc etc) and I am not going to
hand
>some greedy bugger more.
>-Faras

I was quite lucky. I was given my Lambent stone after helping a couple of
higher levels in a GM run event. They were very beat up and needed healing
to avoid missing the rest of the event. All the clerics were oom from
nuking undead and healing during the fight so they were very grateful. I
have seen them for sale on vendors as well, notably in W Karana. Vendors
sell them for about 40pp at best price.

Kitasi of E'ci
